m_szDocTitle: Model X, Model S 70, 2016 Volt, or 2016 LEAF -- CleanTechnica Car of the Year Voting Still Live! | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Sorry Zach, I mean the field of contenders…. http://zacharyshahan.com/ Zachary Shahan ah, well, that would be every car new to the market or heavily revised. i.e., we didn’t have a “1st round.” Delicious Points Why can’t I see the results? In other words who’s winning? Kyle Field All shall be revealed in good time…in other words, when the contest is over at the end of the month Paul Model X.  My reasoning may be different from others.  The Model X has the torque, size and towing capacity needed for a pickup truck.  The X provides an excellent proving ground.  Real change will come with a Tesla
